item.name: The Bloody Chamber
item.description: Shirley Jackson gets a lot of (well-deserved) love and respect these days as a major talent in midcentury horror and mystery, but we should spare a thought for the criminally underappreciated Angela Carter.

item.name: Carrie
item.description: There are many incredible Stephen King novels, but Carrie was his first and remains our favorite.
